channel.title: EX0TiC Scape 317 new updates everyday
channel.description:
[size=10pt][b]join us now[/b][/size] @ [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/[/url]
Forums: [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/[/url]
[size=10pt]WebClient[/size]: [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient[/url]
[size=10pt][b]If you want a better view at the pictures please visit our website @ [/b] [/size] [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=15035832]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=15035832[/url]
[size=20pt]I am currently adding music it will update in a while![/size] [youtube]http://youtu.be/syxdTGmb52Y[/youtube]
[b]Hello and welcome to[/b] [b][size=10pt]EX0TiC Scape[/size][/b].
[b]This server is based off of epicurus I myself used to play it and I loved the server but Jayden quit running it and now I want to continue his legacy by bringing it back! This server is amazing.[/b]
[u]Features:[/u]
Barrows! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/161am2c.jpg[/img]
help zone!!! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/300z19f.jpg[/img]
chaos ele!! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33bmsyb.jpg[/img]
Home! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23ua2zb.jpg[/img]
Market tele! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2vao8c9.jpg[/img]
mining [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2saarkj.jpg[/img]
pk scoreboard! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ir6yh0.jpg[/img]
working party room! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2nibn7m.jpg[/img]
wood cutting area! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/54f0oj.jpg[/img]
pest control! [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2qvb8m0.jpg[/img]
KBD dropping visage?! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2iqzxus.png[/img]
custom help zone! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/300z19f.jpg[/img]
custom penguins!!!!!!!! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/33m1mc0.png[/img]
Corporal beast!! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lnbwjo.png[/img]
[u]player[/u]
[b]::players / shows all playewrs online their rank their lvl [/b] [b]::help / teleports you to the staffzone and pings all staff members online staff will show up if online. (DO NOT ABUSE OR IPBAN!!!!!!)[/b] [b]::rules / shows rules[/b] [b]::commands [/b] / shows the players, rights command(s) EX: player types ::commands it shows player commands. Mod types ::commands shows mod + player commands and so on!
[size=10pt][b]this is an eco/pk server the switching is literally the best ive seen on all servers ive played also theres no lag at all as far as we know.[/b][/size]
this server is also brand new so please remember we will probably have to work some bugs and glitches out but you have to help by submitting them to forums or use the
[size=20pt]::help[/size] / this is a custom command, when typed it will ping all staff members online whilst teleporting you to the helpzone. after a staff member gets the ping they can ::confirmhelp if available which will teleport them to you!
[center]specials work on everything good switching!! working Dark bow! w/ special
working d claws w/ special full godwars bosses all ags's work properly Full primal w/ weapons chaotic weapons polypore staff!! ganodermic armour! Full dragonbone melee armour (being swapped to new minigame soon) Full dragonbone mage armour (being swapped to new minigame soon) korasi full torva full virtus colorful whips! Voting shop (voting w/ reward shall be working very soon) [size=10pt][u][b]all pking is mastered 100% switching![/b][/u][/size] working curse prayers working veng working ancients curses work all prayers work katana =D (very overpowered) - this is also being swapped to the new minigame once we release it! [size=10pt]100 % working duel arena with staking and option to choose certain weapon arrangements![/size] We added Penguins/ice warriors/ice giants to the remmington dungeon makes a very nice secondary training spot with, plus who doesn't love penguins =P [b]completely re written crafting works great![/b] working fishing in skill teleport!! - still need to add animations! [size=10pt]No duping in our awesome G.E.[/size]
[size=22pt]WE NOW HAVE 100% WORKING ANIMATED TORMENTED DEMONS!!!![/size] [center][IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/10s9ca1.png[/img][/center]
and much much more
[b]We have updated the server everyday and are very dedicated to our current players and expect much much more. we have not had a player that has joined that said they don't like out server![/b]
and we saved the best for last!!![size=10pt][b] NO LAG AT ALL[/b][/size]!!! please do not blame your slow computers as lag i just got a 16 GB ram pc with 2 tb memory and as soon as we reach a certain limit of people and i will get a vps and as the community gets larger so will the capacity of the vps!
2 worlds EX0TiC Scape Original, EX0TiC Scape Pk (im not a big fan of the pk server. but I will run it for the ones who did like it on epicurus once i get it up to par with the original.) vip's, supporters, mod, head mod, admin, head admin, owner, coder status's
I will hire staff according to the traffic the server aqquires the more players the more staff we will need
all donations go towards server for upgrades and expansions for more players with no lag etc (a lot of servers say this and don't mean it.) we mean it....
all bosses work properly (tormented demons coming soon)
all teleports work properly
main pk area's edge and green drag's!! pking is flawless.
I and my programmer are in the process of creating our own custom minigame the only info I will release is its name!!
[size=10pt][b]Team Dragonslayer!!!!![/b][/size]
join us to find out more info about it!!!!
and much much more!![/center]
Staff: Owner: Stevo (I will hire staff according to the traffic the server aqquires the more players the more staff we will need) Coder(s): Stevo, Riipiin, [size=12pt][u][b]IfearI[/b][/u][/size] (the rest of my credits will go to jayden himself) Co-Owner: EX0TiC Head Admin: Open Admin: Open [b]Head Mod: Vinny[/b] Mod: Open Mod: Open Mod: Open V.I.P's: 5 slots open Reason being, we are currently not a vps server yet, BUT!!!! we have already had 20+ players online running off of our brand new cp we had just gotten and we have yet to even think about lag or anything. and looking to get a vps as soon as donations start to roll in more
Remind you this server just hit 24 hours online Friday, august 16th at 3:31 p.m. eastern pacific time zone
were looking to expand!!! join us now!!!
join us now @ [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/[/url]
Forums: [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/[/url]
WebClient: [url=http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient]http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient[/url]

item.title: EX0TiC Scape 317 new updates everyday
item.dc:creator: @St3vo St3vo
item.description:
@St3vo wrote:

Java-RSPS-Noob:

I’d consider increasing the size of your images some. You can use img=width

well I saved them from the website link with out enlarging them and didn’t think about when I uploaded them to here they would be the same size as wen I saved them but yea that’s what happened so ill have to go thru all of them again…

but thank you for your input

Read full topic

item.title: EX0TiC Scape 317 new updates everyday
item.dc:creator: @St3vo St3vo

and a nicer edit… for example add colourful writing with italics and underline for the titles and make it stand out… this advertisement is boring/dull make it colorful and attractive to the eye :)[/quote]

Thanks and good luck with your server.

item.title: EX0TiC Scape 317 new updates everyday
item.dc:creator: @St3vo St3vo
item.description:
@St3vo wrote:

[size=10pt]join us now[/size] @ http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/

Forums: http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/

[size=10pt]WebClient[/size]: http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient

[size=10pt]If you want a better view at the pictures please visit our website @ [/size] http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/photos/album?albumid=15035832

[size=20pt]I am currently adding music it will update in a while![/size]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/syxdTGmb52Y[/youtube]

Hello and welcome to [size=10pt]EX0TiC Scape[/size].

This server is based off of epicurus I myself used to play it and I loved the server but Jayden quit running it and now I want to continue his legacy by bringing it back! This server is amazing.

Features:

Barrows!

help zone!!!

chaos ele!!

Home!

Market tele!

mining

pk scoreboard!

working party room!

wood cutting area!

pest control!

KBD dropping visage?!

custom help zone!

custom penguins!!!

Corporal beast!!

player

::players / shows all playewrs online their rank their lvl
::help / teleports you to the staffzone and pings all staff members online staff will show up if online. (DO NOT ABUSE OR IPBAN!!!)
::rules / shows rules
::commands / shows the players, rights command(s) EX: player types ::commands it shows player commands. Mod types ::commands shows mod + player commands and so on!

[size=10pt]this is an eco/pk server the switching is literally the best ive seen on all servers ive played also theres no lag at all as far as we know.[/size]

this server is also brand new so please remember we will probably have to work some bugs and glitches out but you have to help by submitting them to forums or use the

[size=20pt]::help[/size] / this is a custom command, when typed it will ping all staff members online whilst teleporting you to the helpzone. after a staff member gets the ping they can ::confirmhelp if available which will teleport them to you!

[center]specials work on everything
good switching!!
working Dark bow! w/ special

working d claws w/ special
full godwars bosses
all ags’s work properly
Full primal w/ weapons
chaotic weapons
polypore staff!!
ganodermic armour!
Full dragonbone melee armour (being swapped to new minigame soon)
Full dragonbone mage armour (being swapped to new minigame soon)
korasi
full torva
full virtus
colorful whips!
Voting shop (voting w/ reward shall be working very soon)
[size=10pt]all pking is mastered 100% switching![/size]
working curse prayers
working veng
working ancients
curses work all prayers work
katana =D (very overpowered) - this is also being swapped to the new minigame once we release it!
[size=10pt]100 % working duel arena with staking and option to choose certain weapon arrangements![/size]
We added Penguins/ice warriors/ice giants to the remmington dungeon makes a very nice secondary training spot with, plus who doesn’t love penguins =P
completely re written crafting works great!
working fishing in skill teleport!! - still need to add animations!
[size=10pt]No duping in our awesome G.E.[/size]

[size=22pt]WE NOW HAVE 100% WORKING ANIMATED TORMENTED DEMONS!!![/size]
[center][/center]

and much much more

We have updated the server everyday and are very dedicated to our current players and expect much much more. we have not had a player that has joined that said they don’t like out server!

and we saved the best for last!!![size=10pt] NO LAG AT ALL[/size]!!! please do not blame your slow computers as lag i just got a 16 GB ram pc with 2 tb memory and as soon as
we reach a certain limit of people and i will get a vps and as the community gets larger so will the capacity of the vps!

2 worlds EX0TiC Scape Original, EX0TiC Scape Pk (im not a big fan of the pk server. but I will run it for the ones who did like it on epicurus once i get it up to par with the original.)
vip’s, supporters, mod, head mod, admin, head admin, owner, coder status’s

I will hire staff according to the traffic the server aqquires the more players the more staff we will need

all donations go towards server for upgrades and expansions for more players with no lag etc (a lot of servers say this and don’t mean it.) we mean it…

all bosses work properly (tormented demons coming soon)

all teleports work properly

main pk area’s edge and green drag’s!! pking is flawless.

I and my programmer are in the process of creating our own custom minigame the only info I will release is its name!!

[size=10pt]Team Dragonslayer!!![/size]

join us to find out more info about it!!!

and much much more!![/center]

Staff:
Owner: Stevo (I will hire staff according to the traffic the server aqquires the more players the more staff we will need)
Coder(s): Stevo, Riipiin, [size=12pt]IfearI[/size] (the rest of my credits will go to jayden himself)
Co-Owner: EX0TiC
Head Admin: Open
Admin: Open
Head Mod: Vinny
Mod: Open
Mod: Open
Mod: Open
V.I.P’s: 5 slots open
Reason being, we are currently not a vps server yet, BUT!!! we have already had 20+ players online running off of our brand new cp we had just gotten and we have yet to even think about lag or anything.
and looking to get a vps as soon as donations start to roll in more

Remind you this server just hit 24 hours online Friday, august 16th at 3:31 p.m. eastern pacific time zone

were looking to expand!!! join us now!!!

join us now @ http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/

Forums: http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/apps/forums/

WebClient: http://ex0ticscape-rsps.webs.com/webclient

Read full topic
